## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Storage Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chests at positions:
  - (-21.5, -54.5) with 1000 iron plates
  - (-20.5, -54.5) with 1000 iron plates
  - (-19.5, -54.5) with 1000 iron plates
  - (-18.5, -54.5) with 1000 iron plates
  - (-4.5, -52.5) with 1600 iron plates (full)
  - (-9.5, -50.5) with 1445 iron plates
  - (-8.5, -50.5) with 1445 iron plates
  - (-7.5, -50.5) with 665 iron plates
  - (-6.5, -50.5) with 492 iron plates
  - (-11.5, -50.5) with 250 iron plates
  - (-15.5, -49.5) with 1600 iron plates (full)

### Iron Ore Extraction and Processing Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (4.0, -60.0) with coal as fuel and iron ore as resource
- Wooden chest at position (4.5, -58.5) with 486 iron ore
- Stone furnaces at positions:
  - (-15.0, -48.0) with 22 iron plates, no ingredients to smelt
  - (-13.0, -48.0) with 22 iron plates, no ingredients to smelt
  - (-11.0, -48.0) with 45 iron plates, no ingredients to smelt

### Additional Storage
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chests at positions:
  - (5.5, -60.5) with 183 iron plates
  - (7.5, -60.5) with 183 iron plates
  - (6.5, -60.5) with 183 iron plates
  - (9.5, -60.5) with 183 iron plates
  - (8.5, -60.5) with 183 iron plates
- Iron chests at positions:
  - (-3.5, -52.5) with 1476 iron plates
  - (-5.5, -50.5) with 326 iron ore and 1500 iron plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting placement to avoid conflicts with existing objects.

### Inventory Management Errors
- Ensure there is enough space in your inventory before extracting items from chests to avoid extraction errors.

### Fuel Management for Mining Drills
- Keep a sufficient supply of coal in your inventory to refuel burner mining drills as needed.

### Chest Management
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to maintain continuous operation of mining drills and prevent resource bottlenecks.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- `place_entity`: Used to place entities on the map. Ensure the target position is clear of other objects to avoid placement errors.

### Important Variables
- `new_chest_position`: Position where new wooden chests are intended to be placed.
- `inventory`: A dictionary tracking the current inventory items and their quantities.
